description: Case Logic is obsessed with organization! No matter who you are, what toys, tools or technology you have, where you are, or where you are going, Case Logic is your partner in managing the things that matter to you. We are the "stuff wranglers" that make life easier.  Upgrade your commute with the new Case Logic VNC-15 15.4" Slimline Laptop case from Case Logic!  The VNC-15 Laptop case fits 15.4" laptops.  The "V" stands for VALUE and Case Logic has designed the VNC-15 to have industry best function and value only found in Case Logic products.  Organizer panel provides extra storage for files, discs and other computer accessories.  Adjustable internal compartment with moveable padded divider accommodates a variety of laptop sizes, always ensuring a perfect fit (see recommended laptop dimensions below).  Speed Pocket¿ - A quick access, secure place to put valuables (watch, keys, coins, etc.) prior to passing through airport security.  Interior sleeve is perfect for files, documents, magazines and newspapers.  25 Year limited Warranty!
title: Case Logic VNC-15 15.4-inch Value Slimline Laptop Case (Black)
